title: Cedar Lodge logo - Stempel Scheidler, ??? {Yves, ???}
content:
hi there!!!!  
need your help...(which makes sense, as i post here!!)

looking for the two fonts used in the logo.  
the closest font i found for LODGE is itc giovanni,  
but is not quite right...serif in the w...

any idea? cheeeeerrrss

 [‹ (x) Devon's Bakery & Cafe - Jeffriana {Stephen}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122010631/http:/typophile.com/node/19078 "Go to previous forum topic") [Here are a few... ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122010631/http:/typophile.com/node/19029 "Go to next forum topic")
author: agostini

comments.content: The script is a copperplate a.k.a. [English script](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122010631/http:/www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=english+script), but don’t ask me which one, and I even don’t know if it is perhaps custom drawn or at least customised.
thanks for your help!!!! have a good day...!!
